title: 96/97/EC: Commission Decision of 12 January 1996 amending Decision 92/542/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams and embryo production teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 January 1996 amending Decision 92/542/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams and embryo production teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community (Text with EEA relevance) (96/97/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. In Part 1 of the Annex to Decision 92/452/EEC, in respect of Canada:
(a) the following embryo collection team is added:

This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 January 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
